    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractPollingIoController

        public AbstractPollingIoController(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                   java.lang.Class<? extends IOProcessor<S>> processorType,
                                   AbstractIOConfig config)
        Constructor
        参数:
        executor - can provided by outside code. Pass null if you want this controller to create a Default one.
        processorType - used to construct processor which will be responsible for handling read/write I/O events.
        config - the base configuration used for creation of IOSession's configuration

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDefaultThreadPollExecutor

        protected java.util.concurrent.Executor getDefaultThreadPollExecutor()
        This method will create and @return a default executor. It is invoke only by the constructor.
        指定者:
        getDefaultThreadPollExecutor 在类中 AbstractIOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>

      • dispose0

        protected void dispose0()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will release any resources. It is invoked only once by AbstractIOController.dispose().
        指定者:
        dispose0 在类中 AbstractIOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If the dispose failed

      • isSecure

        public boolean isSecure()
        Note : we don't support SSL/TLS protocol by now
        返回:
        whether this controller is used for secure connection(SSL/TLS)

      • setSecure

        public void setSecure(boolean secure)
        Set this controller to be secure mode (SSL/TLS) Note : we don't support SSL/TLS protocol by now
        参数:
        secure - true for secure mode. false as default

      • getConnectCheckIntervalMs

        public long getConnectCheckIntervalMs()
        Get the select timeout interval for OP_CONNECT used for Selector.select(long timeout)
        返回:
        interval time in millisecond

      • setConnectCheckIntervalMs

        public void setConnectCheckIntervalMs(long connectCheckIntervalMs)
        Set the select timeout intervel for OP_CONNECT used for Selector.select(long timeout) the value greater than 1000L will not take effect
        参数:
        connectCheckIntervalMs - interval time in millisecond

      • setSelectable

        public void setSelectable(boolean selectable)
        Set selectable.
        参数:
        selectable - Set to true when the controller has been initialized Set to false when the controller will be destroyed.

      • getConfig

        public AbstractIOConfig getConfig()
        返回:
        the base configuration instance of this controller. Any modification to this instance will be applied to the sessions created after.

      • createSession

        public S createSession(java.net.SocketAddress remoteAddress,
                       AbstractIOConfig config)
        Create a new IOSession
        参数:
        remoteAddress - the SocketAddress of remote endpoint this session will connect to lately.
        config - session's configuration which used only by this session. Modification to this configuration will effect on the session immediately.
        返回:
        An IOSession instance.

      • createSession

        public S createSession(java.lang.String remoteHost,
                       int remotePort,
                       AbstractIOConfig config)
        Create a new IOSession
        参数:
        remoteHost - the host domain of remote endpoint this session will connect to lately.
        remotePort - the port on which the remote endpoint listened for connections.
        config - session's configuration which used only by this session. Modification to this configuration will effect on the session immediately.
        返回:
        An IOSession instance.

      • connect

        public boolean connect(IOFuture future)
        Offer a Connect request to Controller,
        参数:
        future - the ConnectFuture implementation bound to the IOSession which should be built a connection to some remote endpoint.
        返回:
        true if success, false otherwise

      • cancelConnect

        public void cancelConnect(IOFuture future)
        Offer a cancel-connect request to Controller
        参数:
        future - the ConnectFuture implementation should be canceled

      • buildSession

        protected abstract S buildSession(java.lang.String host,
                                  java.lang.Integer port)
        build a IOSession connected to specified host:port, use the controller's configuration as the base config
        参数:
        host - the host domain of remote endpoint this session will connect to lately.
        port - the port on which the remote endpoint listened for connections.
        返回:
        An IOSession instance.

      • buildSession

        protected abstract S buildSession(java.lang.String host,
                                  java.lang.Integer port,
                                  AbstractIOConfig config)
        build a IOSession connected to specified host:port with the specified configuration
        参数:
        host - the host domain of remote endpoint this session will connect to lately.
        port - the port on which the remote endpoint listened for connections.
        config - session's configuration which used only by this session. Modification to this configuration will effect on the session immediately.
        返回:
        An IOSession instance.

      • newSession

        protected abstract S newSession(IOProcessor<S> processor)
        Create a new IOSession instance
        参数:
        processor - The processor the session will offer to after connection built.
        返回:
        a new IOSession instance

      • newChannel

        protected abstract CH newChannel()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new client socket channel
        返回:
        a new client socket channel
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying systems calls

      • closeChannel

        protected abstract void closeChannel(CH channel)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Close a client socket.
        参数:
        channel - the client socket
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying systems calls

      • connect

        protected abstract boolean connect(CH channel,
                                   java.net.SocketAddress remoteAddress)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Connect a newly created client socket channel to a remote address. This operation is non-blocking,
        参数:
        channel - the client socket channel
        remoteAddress - the remote address where to connect
        返回:
        true if a connection was established immediately, false if the connection operation is in progress
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If the connect failed

      • finishConnect

        protected abstract boolean finishConnect(CH channel)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Finish the connection of a client socket after it was reported to be ready by the select(int) call.
        参数:
        channel - the client socket channel to finish the connection
        返回:
        true if the socket is connected, false if connection failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying systems calls

      • registerConnecting

        protected abstract void registerConnecting(CH channel,
                                           IOFuture future)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Register a new client socket for connection operation, add it to polling
        参数:
        channel - client socket channel
        future - the ConnectFuture as the attachment
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying systems calls

      • getFuture

        protected abstract IOFuture getFuture(CH channel)
        get the IOFuture for a given client socket channel
        参数:
        channel - the socket client channel
        返回:
        the connection IOFuture

      • select

        protected abstract int select(int timeout)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Check for connected sockets, interrupt when at least one connection is processed (connected or failed to connect). Use selectedChannel() to get all the client socket processed.
        参数:
        timeout - The timeout for the select
        返回:
        The number of processed socket
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying systems calls

      • isSelectorEmpty

        protected abstract boolean isSelectorEmpty()
        返回:
        whether the list of polled sessions is empty

      • wakeup

        protected abstract void wakeup()
        Interrupt the select(int timeout) method. Used when the polled sessions queue changed

      • selectedChannel

        protected abstract java.util.Iterator<java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel> selectedChannel()
        Iterator for the set of sockets with connection processed. during the last select(int timeout) call.
        返回:
        the list of processed sockets channels

      • allChannels

        protected abstract java.util.Iterator<java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel> allChannels()
        Iterator for all the client sockets polled for connection.
        返回:
        the list of client sockets currently polled for connection

      • destroy

        protected abstract void destroy()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Destroy the controller, will be called by AbstractIOController.dispose()
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying systems calls
